name: system.listMethods
category: Functions Defined by the XML-RPC Standard
description: This method lists all RPC methods, the Homegear RPC server knows or, when being sent by Homegear's RPC client, requests all methods the RPC event server knows.
returnValue: eturns an array of strings. Each element is one function name.

exampleOutput.output:
(Array length=34)
{
  (String) addDevice
  (String) addLink
  (String) deleteDevice
  (String) deleteMetadata
  (String) getAllMetadata
  (String) getDeviceDescription
  (String) getInstallMode
  (String) getKeyMismatchDevice
  (String) getLinkInfo
  (String) getLinkPeers
  (String) getLinks
  (String) getMetadata
  (String) getParamset
  (String) getParamsetDescription
  (String) getParamsetId
  (String) getServiceMessages
  (String) getValue
  (String) init
  (String) listBidcosInterfaces
  (String) listDevices
  (String) listTeams
  (String) logLevel
  (String) putParamset
  (String) removeLink
  (String) setInstallMode
  (String) setLinkInfo
  (String) setMetadata
  (String) setTeam
  (String) setValue
  (String) system.getCapabilities
  (String) system.listMethods
  (String) system.methodHelp
  (String) system.methodSignature
  (String) system.multicall
}
